mentionedBy.notes: Native NetSuite SuiteApp bringing recurring billing inside NetSuite. Automates revenue recognition, accelerated reporting, audit-readiness. Supports subscription, usage-based, milestone billing. Built-in ASC 606/IFRS 15 compliance.
